item.title: Hackers are STUCK!
item.author: mubix
item.description: Security oriented Linux Live CD “WHAX” is supposedly merging with Auditor. Quick history of WHAX: Whoppix based off Knoppix: Awesome CD Whoppix gets a name change and base distro change: Not broken, don’t fix it. New WHAX website gets hacked: ironic. Sep 9th… We (WHAX) are merging with Auditor, we need a new name: Anyone up for a downhill run? STILL NO UPDATE! What’s going on guys? jd
